overview: Joel Hunt served as a combat engineer from 1998-2007, with multiple tours in Iraq. While there, he endured more than 15 roadside bombs, and experienced a traumatic brain injury (TBI). Today, with the help of his dog, Barrett, he uses sports to push through the challenges of having a TBI.
tagline: The things we love help us endure and overcome.
title: Joel Hunt: Traumatic Brain Injury (TBI)
